column4: I am not being able to install the flash player; I already installed the downloaded .deb from Adobe, compiled the sources, and installed the flash-plugin-nonfree. Does anybody know something about this?
you can download the 32bit tar.gz and extract the .so file to ~/.mozilla/plugins
you will need to create the plugins folder
if I was in 64bit, would it be idfferent?
theres a 64bit beta flash which is pretty decent, same method different file to download
i already tried it, but there's no change; do you think there are any additional steps I should take?
if the file doesnt exist then you've done it wrong
you need firefox to completely close so the plugins are reloaded
I'll try rebooting, because nothings happening. brb
